Cookie Name Host Google Analytics Google Inc.
ASUS places cookies by using advertising campaign services, such as Hubrus DSP, Google AdWords, and Google DoubleClick.
Category 3: targeting cookies or advertising cookies Cookies are used to deliver advertising that is more relevant to you and your interests by storing how you use our SERVICE.
Cookies are also used to limit the number of times you see an advertisement as well as help measure the effectiveness of the advertising campaigns.
The information cookies collect is only used between ASUS and advertising campaign service providers.
